verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Adversary|strong="H7854"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w accuse|strong="H7853"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* messenger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Adversary|strong="H7854"\w*, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Adversary|strong="H7854"\w*! \w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*! \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brand \w plucked|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire?”

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* garments \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* messenger \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H5975"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* garments.” \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Joshua \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* priestly \w robes|strong="H4254"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* ordered: “\w Set|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w turban|strong="H6797"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w turban|strong="H6797"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* garments. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*:

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “If \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* if \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w instructions|strong="H1870"\w*, \w then|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rule \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* access among \w these|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* associates \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w going|strong="H2005"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* bring \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Branch|strong="H6780"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* stone \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* stone, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* facets. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w engrave|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, “\w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*.”
